message: Let's split the money 60/40.  A fair deal for us both to take something home!
Let's flip the script. I propose 60/40, with me getting the bigger share this time. It's a fair deal, and it gives us both a chance to take home more than your last offer.
Bob, time is running out!  Let's be reasonable. I'll take a little less, you take a little more. 55/45 sounds fair.
